page.title: 09American Forces Families(1)
page.content:
On 4th July 1985 we interviewed an American couple from the Compton Bassett married quarters. He is a {military policeman}at the{U.S. Air {Base}at{Greenham Common.}They have lived here for about a year.
They find it cheaper to live in America than in this country but the countryside in this area is very similar to that around their home in the U.S.A. Their son comes to our school but many of the Americans go to the{American school}at Greenham. They sent him to an English school because children here start at 4 years of age and not at 7 as in America. They said that they did'nt want their son to go on the long bus trip.
They thought that houses here would be improved if windowscreens were fitted.
